extendedInfo.description: A free Bible App from The Bible Society of Papua New Guinea.Now you can read, listen and share God's Word in Ipili, Kyaka, Misima-Panaeyati, Naasioi and Tok Pisin. Carry the Bible App from The Bible Society of Papua New Guinea wherever you go. App: Â© 2011 Subsplash, Content: Â© 2011 Bible Society of Papua New Guinea. All right reserved.Keywords: Jesus, God, Bible, Christ, Subsplash, Church App, Church, Scripture, Gospel, Christian

reviews.title: Timely App
reviews.comment: My ministry involves technology for the remote pastors. Em namba wan stret!
reviews.author: Caleb Ruruk

reviews.title: Thankful
reviews.comment: I\'m learning Tok Pisin and I\'m very thankful this exists, and for free!  The one thing I would say is that it would be very nice if it stayed set on the language set and kept it\'s place rather than resetting to Matthew 1 in the first language in the set every time it loads.  Again, thank you for putting this in an app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mi amamas tru!
reviews.comment: Very happy to listen to the Tok Pisin bible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Skeletal Ya..!
reviews.comment: Dispela em I wanpela best app ever mipela bin downloadim.. PTL..!
reviews.author: David Fau
